title: [Epidemiology] Global Covid-19 death toll ‘may be three times higher than official figures’. Researchers studying ‘excess deaths’ estimate that more than 18 million people died of disease by end of 2021

[Health] Study finds fewer COVID-19 cases in schools with mandatory masking during Delta surge. The study included more than 1.1 million students and over 157,000 staff attending in-person school across nine states. Including, North Carolina, Wisconsin, Missouri, California, Washington, Kansas and Texas
